reviewText: I haven't been fortunate to get a copy of this dvd by 4 HIM.  I love 4 HIM.  I have almost every cd by them and they are still the best that can be found in Christian entertainment.  So I know I will love this dvd.  Does anyone know where I can get one for my own?  It is a must have.  I am a little concerned that such an awesome group and dvd is out of print with my understanding.  But I sure gotta have it!  Come on, send me one!

I really love this DVD and miss my copy which
I lost or misplaced in the process of moving.
I hope it will be available again in the near future.
I bought 15 copies to send to friends in New Orleans who lost gospel music due to Hurricane
Katrina,they loved and appreciated the DVD's.
I do have the music on CD, but the DVD is better.
